pli-tv-pvr1.9:1.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ …pe…
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.6: Sudinno kalandaputto purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.26: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe…
pli-tv-pvr1.9:6.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena adinnaṃ ādiyanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:6.6: Dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:6.9: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:6.10: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:6.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.9:7.1: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:7.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:7.9: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:7.10: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:7.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.9:8.1: Asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:8.6: Vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:8.9: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:8.10: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:8.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.9:10.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṃ ārabbha, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ …pe…
pli-tv-pvr1.9:11.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:11.6: Āyasmā seyyasako upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:11.26: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe…
pli-tv-pvr1.9:15.1: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:15.6: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:15.9: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe…. #2
pli-tv-pvr1.9:16.1: Mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:16.6: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:16.9: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:16.10: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:16.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #3
pli-tv-pvr1.9:17.1: Mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:17.6: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:18.6: Āyasmā udāyī sañcarittaṃ samāpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:18.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:18.10: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:18.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:18.12: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:18.13: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.9:18.14: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #5
pli-tv-pvr1.9:19.1: Saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:19.6: Āḷavakā bhikkhū saññācikāya kuṭiyo kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:20.1: Mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:20.6: Āyasmā channo vihāravatthuṃ sodhento aññataraṃ cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:21.1: Bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:21.6: Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:22.1: Bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:22.6: Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:23.1: Saṃghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:23.6: Devadatto samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:23.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #10
pli-tv-pvr1.9:24.1: Bhedakānuvattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:24.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū devadattassa saṃghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā ahesuṃ vaggavādakā, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:24.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #11
pli-tv-pvr1.9:25.1: Dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:25.6: Āyasmā channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:25.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #12
pli-tv-pvr1.9:26.1: Kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:26.6: Assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakatā bhikkhū chandagāmitā dosagāmitā mohagāmitā bhayagāmitā pāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:26.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #13
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi akaṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.9: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe…. #14
